data.lyric:
[ti:I'll Never Love Again (Extended Version) (《一个明星的诞生》电影插曲)]
[ar:Lady Gaga]
[al:A Star Is Born Soundtrack (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]I'll Never Love Again (Extended Version) - Lady Gaga
[00:04.39]Lyricist：Aaron Raitiere/Hillary Lindsey/Natalie Hemby/Lady Gaga
[00:08.79]Composer：Aaron Raitiere/Hillary Lindsey/Natalie Hemby/Lady Gaga
[00:13.19]Producer：Lady Gaga/Benjamin Rice
[00:17.59]Wish I could I could've said goodbye
[00:26.05]I would've said what I wanted to
[00:31.27]Maybe even cried for you
[00:35.91]If I knew it would be the last time
[00:44.16]I would've broke my heart in two
[00:48.96]Tryin' to save a part of you
[00:53.73]Don't wanna feel another touch
[00:57.81]Don't wanna start another fire
[01:02.26]Don't wanna know another kiss
[01:07.09]No other name falling off my lips
[01:11.72]Don't wanna to give my heart away
[01:16.58]To another stranger
[01:20.62]Or let another day begin
[01:24.60]Won't even let the sunlight in
[01:28.95]No I'll never love again
[01:38.27]I'll never love again ooh
[01:51.65]When we first met
[01:54.90]I never thought that I would fall
[01:59.28]I never thought that I'd find myself
[02:04.20]Lying in your arms
[02:09.65]And I want to pretend that it's not true
[02:13.28]Oh baby that you're gone
[02:18.05]'Cause my world keeps turning and turning and turning
[02:21.99]And I'm not moving on
[02:25.32]Don't wanna feel another touch
[02:29.75]Don't wanna start another fire
[02:34.10]Don't wanna know another kiss
[02:38.25]No other name falling off my lips
[02:42.83]Don't wanna give my heart away
[02:47.41]To another stranger
[02:51.45]Or let another day begin
[02:55.36]Won't even let the sunlight in
[02:59.29]No I'll never love
[03:03.11]I don't wanna know this feeling
[03:06.51]Unless it's you and me
[03:10.84]I don't wanna waste a moment ooh
[03:20.36]And I don't wanna give somebody else the better part of me
[03:28.23]I would rather wait for you ooh
[03:38.59]Don't wanna feel another touch
[03:42.14]Don't wanna start another fire
[03:46.01]Don't wanna know another kiss
[03:50.63]Baby I'll stay on your lips
[03:54.79]Don't wanna give my heart away
[03:59.56]To another stranger
[04:03.57]Or let another day begin
[04:07.38]Won't even let the sunlight in
[04:11.48]Oh I'll never love again
[04:18.40]Love again
[04:21.17]Oh I'll never love again
[04:25.56]I'll never love again
[04:35.76]I wouldn't want to swear I can
[04:38.94]I wish I could but I just won't
[04:42.86]I'll never love again
[04:47.43]I'll never love again, oh
data.trans:
[ti:我不会再陷入爱河 (Extended Version) (《一个明星的诞生》电影插曲)]
[ar:Lady Gaga]
[al:A Star Is Born Soundtrack (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.39]//
[00:08.79]//
[00:13.19]//
[00:17.59]多希望我能勇敢挥手道别
[00:26.05]多希望我能鼓起勇气诉说心声
[00:31.27]或是为你不禁黯然落泪
[00:35.91]若是我早些明白 这将是最后一次
[00:44.16]我的心应该会碎成两半吧
[00:48.96]试着将你的回忆保存心间
[00:53.73]不愿再感受他人的爱抚
[00:57.81]不愿再重燃心中爱的火焰
[01:02.26]不愿再感受他人的热吻
[01:07.09]不愿我的口中呼唤他人姓名
[01:11.72]不愿再将自己的真心托付
[01:16.58]托付给另一个不曾相识的陌生人
[01:20.62]也不愿重新开始
[01:24.60]不愿让阳光照亮心间
[01:28.95]不 我不会再投身爱河
[01:38.27]我不会再陷入爱河
[01:51.65]我们第一次邂逅
[01:54.90]我从未想过我会坠入爱河
[01:59.28]未想过我会卸下防备
[02:04.20]安心投入你的臂弯
[02:09.65]而我多希望 你离开的消息
[02:13.28]亲爱的 如果不是真的该多好
[02:18.05]我的世界依旧翻天覆地 天旋地转
[02:21.99]而我依旧止步不前 难以释怀
[02:25.32]不愿再感受他人的爱抚
[02:29.75]不愿再重燃心中爱的火焰
[02:34.10]不愿再感受他人的热吻
[02:38.25]不愿我的口中呼唤他人姓名
[02:42.83]不愿再将自己的真心托付
[02:47.41]托付给另一个不曾相识的陌生人
[02:51.45]也不愿重新开始
[02:55.36]不愿让阳光照亮心间
[02:59.29]不 我不会爱上别人
[03:03.11]我不愿了解这感觉
[03:06.51]除非它只属于你我
[03:10.84]不愿再浪费一分一秒
[03:20.36]不愿把更好的自己献给其他人
[03:28.23]我愿为你守候
[03:38.59]不愿再感受他人的爱抚
[03:42.14]不愿再重燃心中爱的火焰
[03:46.01]不愿再感受他人的热吻
[03:50.63]亲爱的 我会沉醉于你唇间
[03:54.79]不愿再将自己的真心托付
[03:59.56]托付给另一个不曾相识的陌生人
[04:03.57]也不愿重新开始
[04:07.38]不愿让阳光照亮心间
[04:11.48]噢 我不会再陷入爱河
[04:18.40]陷入爱河
[04:21.17]噢 我不会再陷入爱河
[04:25.56]我不会再陷入爱河
[04:35.76]我不会再许下誓言
[04:38.94]多希望我能放手 但我终究无法释怀
[04:42.86]我不会再陷入爱河
[04:47.43]我不会再陷入爱河
